  • English KS4 Co-ordinator

English KS4 Co-ordinator

  • School:
    Bede Academy
  • Location:
    Northumberland
  • Salary:
    Main / Upper Payscale plus £1,938 - £3,921 (dependent on experience)
  • Hours:
    Full time
  • Contractual Status:
    Permanent

KS4 English Co-ordinator

Main / Upper Payscale (Plus £1,938 – £3,921 dependant on experience)

We require to start in September, a motivated and passionate graduate qualified to teach English at all levels.  The ability to demonstrate excellent subject knowledge and to consistently teach inspirational lessons as well as effectively manage KS4 in support of the Head of Department is essential.

If you believe you have the vision and commitment to work in an Academy which seeks to raise achievement as well as set and maintain high standards and expectations, please contact Bede Academy.

For an application pack and further information, please visit www.bedeacademy.org.uk Alternatively, please call Mrs Hogg on 01670 545111, option 2 or email recruitment@bedeacademy.org.uk

Closing date: 27 April 2018

Interviews w/c: 7 May 2018

Bede Academy takes its responsibility for safeguarding children very seriously and successful applications will be subject to an Enhanced Disclosure and Barring Service Disclosure along with standard pre-employment safeguarding checks.

Application Form

Bede Academy

Bede Academy, Northumberland
• Bede Academy is the fourth school in the outstandingly successful ESF family.
• Distinct Christian ethos.
• State-of-the-art-facility.
• Excellent standards in student attainment and behaviour with all expected to achieve their personal best.
• Excellent CPD provision and scope for career development.

A Passion for Excellence
